title: Understanding SQL Clauses
text: In SQL, different clauses serve different purposes. The GROUP BY clause is used to arrange identical data into groups.

hintAnswer: To aggregate data based on one or more columns
title: Purpose of GROUP BY
text: What is the purpose of the GROUP BY clause in SQL?
choices: To filter rows based on a condition
To sort the results in ascending or descending order
To aggregate data based on one or more columns
To join two tables based on a common column
